Posts.Content: Hello Ladies. I got an email message saying I had a personal message here on the CSN. When I opened it, it was a letter begging for money and clearly a deliberate attempt at fraud. It was signed from a Helen Bones. Where can I report this. Wanted to let all know about this. Who does this kind of stuff on a site like this?Â
Posts.Title: Got phishing message seeking money, beware
